channel.title: Comments on: The issuing power should be taken from the banks and restored to the people, to whom it properly belongs.” . . . “Paper is poverty. It is the ghost of money and not money itself.”– Thomas Jefferson, 1743-1826 “Wall Street Wall Street Uber Ales”.
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness
